goal:
SimpleComply engages in HealthCare Waste Management activities, providing consulting, training and best practice solutions to minimize Healthcare Waste.

We have a solution that we feel needs to be implemented in every hospital around the world.

In October, we presented our approach to reducing pharmaceutical waste in our water sources to the UNDP, and now we would like to spread our word and also our work to other UN organizations with the aim of meeting SDG 6.

The Healtcare Waste Management solution is a sustainable waste management solution, that immediately reduces the carbon footprint, minimizes risk to healthcare workers, significantly reduces landfilling and ultimately will lead to clean drinking water and a safer environment.


Simplecomply aims to enhance compliance within the Health Care industry with the objective of improving Health Care Waste Management.

Simplecomply’s mission is to empower healthcare organizations to simplify :
• the implementation of solutions, policies and procedures
• the alignment with healthcare standards and quality of care
• the challenges of achieving and maintaining compliance

Our goal is to make our customers feel their initiatives are acknowledged, valued, and carefully considered.
